Title: PDR Medical Dictionary
Author: মেডিকেল ইকোনোমিকস্‌ ষ্টাফ
Summary:
PDR MEDICAL DICTIONARY SECOND EDITION
Newly revised and updated! Includes 1,000 images! The 2nd edition reflects the thorough revision performed by 44 medical consultants as well as a team of skilled editors and lexicographers. Includes a comprehensive cross reference table of generic and brand-name pharmaceuticals and manufacturers, plus a30-page appendix containing useful charts on scales, temperatures, temperature equivalents, metric and SI units, weights, and measures, laboratory and reference values, blood groups and much more. This edition includes the Terminological Atanomica (TA) nomenclature officially approved for gross and neuroanatomy.
